author: cms-sw
body: There was a long pending request to not generate __init__.py under src tree (https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/sw-develtools/1894.html ). New build rules implement this and now it not only generate any __init__.py file but also still allows developers to create/modify and use src/Package/python/*.py files without re-running `scram build`. New build rules has been tested in special `PY_X` IBs
title: [BuildRules] Do not create python/package symlink to src/package/python
